programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire.(n)

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa discover the latter's boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo faces a race against time to avoid eviction. Comedy, starring Keke Palmer and SZA.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: Helm Hammerhand sits on the throne of Rohan, flanked by sons Hama and Haleth and rebellious daughter Hera. Dunlending lord Freca proposes a marital union between Hera and his son Wulf, which Helm loudly rejects. In a subsequent brawl between fathers, Helm unintentionally lands a fatal blow, so Wulf vows revenge and amasses an army led by General Targg. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gaia Wise, Brian Cox, Luke Pasqualino and Lorraine Ashbourne.(n)

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: An ex-soldier meets a teen fleeing a gang, an encounter which forces them to confront their pasts while navigating present realities. Director Mark O'Connor's thriller, starring Luke McQuillan, Aidan Gillen and Daniel Fee.(n)

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A father returns to Australia to buy his childhood home. To celebrate, he takes his teenage son to Luna Bay so they can surf together. However, he becomes locked in a battle of one-upmanship with local thugs. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Julian McMahon.(n)

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption. Writer/director Jed Hart's thriller, starring Lyndsey Marshal and Declan Adamson.(n)

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers' version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson.(n)

programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Speak Like A Child
programme.desc: Moving drama about three close friends forever tied to a dark secret from their teenage past. Drama.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Stranger Brad Pitt arrives at the home of millionaire Anthony Hopkins and his daughter, but brings with him a dark secret. Romantic drama. Strong language/violence/sex.

programme.title: You've Got Mail
programme.desc: Romcom royalty Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan are rival booksellers unaware that they are also anonymous e-mail amours. Novel romance from the director of Sleepless In Seattle.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as a struggling sports agent who falls for single mum Renee Zellweger. Top romantic comedy with Cuba Gooding Jr. Language.

programme.title: Sleepless In Seattle
programme.desc: Lonely widower Tom Hanks becomes a reluctant radio star when his young son calls in to a talk show requesting him a new wife. Classic Nora Ephron romcom with Meg Ryan.

programme.title: Scent Of A Woman
programme.desc: Al Pacino won an Oscar for his grandstanding turn as a blind army colonel who stands up for student Chris O'Donnell. With Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama stars Tom Hanks as the hardened veteran leading a platoon on a risky World War II rescue mission.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Wise-cracking Miami cops Will Smith and Martin Lawrence fight to protect a witness and bring down a heroin crook. Action comedy.

programme.desc: Dive into a world of unmissable Sky Original films.

programme.title: Speak Like A Child
programme.desc: Moving drama about three close friends forever tied to a dark secret from their teenage past. Drama.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as the chubby genius, but his smooth alter-ego is soon causing problems again. Comedy sequel with Janet Jackson. Sex references/flashing images.

programme.title: You, Me And Dupree
programme.desc: Loveable slacker Owen Wilson spectacularly outstays his welcome with newlyweds Matt Dillon and Kate Hudson. Comedy. Contains strong language.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 60s soul trio make it big as backing singers to Eddie Murphy. But fame has a price. Musical with Beyonce and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Playboy Tom Cruise's new romance with dancer Penelope Cruz is ruined by crazed lover Cameron Diaz in this mindbending mystery. Contains strong language/sex/flashing images.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: Jude Law stars in this polished update of the Michael Caine classic. He's the NYC limo driver who smooth-talks Susan Sarandon, Marisa Tomei and Sienna Miller into bed.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: Cady Heron is a hit with the Plastics, before making the mistake of falling for Regina George's ex. Musical adaptation of the 2004 cult classic.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: Breezy comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a tomboy FBI agent tasked with going undercover as a beauty queen to foil a terrorist plot. With Michael Caine and Benjamin Bratt.

programme.desc: FBI agent Sandra Bullock might be too famous for undercover duty, but when bad guys kidnap Miss USA, she jumps back into action. Violent scenes.

programme.desc: In 1920s Chicago, slick lawyer Richard Gere does his best to get showbiz jailbirds Catherine Zeta-Jones and Renee Zellweger off the hook. Dazzling winner of six Oscars.

programme.desc: Unhinged scientist Kevin Bacon steals a new invisibility serum and stalks his colleagues to conceal his crime. Dark sci-fi from the director of Robocop.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A time-space vortex sucks a scientific has-been (Will Ferrell) and his companions (Anna Friel, Danny R. McBride) into an alternate dimension populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: After meeting the gal of his dreams, a charming slacker must contend with an army of her ex-boyfriends, wanting to get rid of him.

programme.title: Snatched

programme.title: Volunteers
